20 #include "my_actuator/my_actuator_control.h"
21 #include <unistd.h>
22 
23 my_actuator_control::my_actuator_control(ros::NodeHandle nh)
24 {
29  nh_ = nh;
30 
31  init_teleop_ = false;
32 
33  act1_enabled_ = false;
34  act2_enabled_ = false;
35  act3_enabled_ = false;
36  act4_enabled_ = false;
37  act1_sw_ = false;
38  act2_sw_ = false;
39  act3_sw_ = false;
40  act4_sw_ = false;
41  velocity_scale_ = 40;
42  motor_ids.reserve(4);
43 
44  error_[0] = "NO Error [Radhe Radhe]";
45  error_[2] = "Motor Stalled [Critical]";
46  error_[4] = "Low Pressure [Donno Dude]";
47  error_[8] = " Over Voltage [Moderate]";
48  error_[16] = "Over Current [Critical]";
49  error_[64] = "Power Overrun [Moderate]";
50  error_[256] = "Speeding [Moderate]";
51  error_[512] = "Empty Error 1";
52  error_[1024] = "Empty Error 2";
53  error_[2048] = "Empty Error 3";
54  error_[4096] = "Very High Temperature [Moderate]";
55  error_[8192] = "Encoder Calibration Error [Moderate]";
56  // health->resize(4);
57  // ROS_INFO("%d: err: %s",64, error_[64].c_str());
58  // cout<<error_[64];
59  toggle_joy_flag_ = -1;
60  port_ = "/dev/crawler";
61  act_api_ = new X10ApiSerial();
62  act_api_->get_port_address(port_);
63 
64  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
65  get_params();
66  init_actuators();
68  init_subs_pubs_srvs();
69 
70  joy_reader_timer_ = nh_.createTimer(ros::Duration(0.01), &my_actuator_control::steer_calc_callback_, this);
71  health_timer_ = nh_.createTimer(ros::Duration(3), &my_actuator_control::health_callback_, this);
72 }
73 my_actuator_control::~my_actuator_control()
74 {
79  // delete joy_reader_timer_;
81  act_api_->rmdX10_shut_down();
82 
83  ROS_INFO("%s: Shutting down", log_header_.c_str());
84 }
85 void my_actuator_control::get_params()
86 {
91  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/right_front_wheel/id", right_front_wheel_id_, 2);
92  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/left_front_wheel/id", left_front_wheel_id_, 1);
93  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/right_rear_wheel/id", right_rear_wheel_id_, 3);
94  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/left_rear_wheel/id", left_rear_wheel_id_, 4);
95  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/right_front_wheel/dir", right_front_wheel_dir_, 1);
96  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/left_front_wheel/dir", left_front_wheel_dir_, -1);
97  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/right_rear_wheel/dir", right_rear_wheel_dir_, 1);
98  nh_.param<int>("/my_actuator/left_rear_wheel/dir", left_rear_wheel_dir_, -1);
99  nh_.param<double>("/my_actuator/wheel_base", WHEEL_BASE_, 0.2913);
100  nh_.param<double>("/my_actuator/wheel_radius", WHEEL_RADIUS_, 0.0525);
102 
103  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/right_front_wheel/id", right_front_wheel_id_))
104  {
105  right_front_wheel_id_ = 2;
106  ROS_WARN("%s Right Front wheel motor id param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
107  right_front_wheel_id_);
108  }
109  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/left_front_wheel/id", left_front_wheel_id_))
110  {
111  left_front_wheel_id_ = 1;
112  ROS_WARN("%s left Front wheel motor id param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
113  left_front_wheel_id_);
114  }
115  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/right_rear_wheel/id", right_rear_wheel_id_))
116  {
117  right_rear_wheel_id_ = 3;
118  ROS_WARN("%s Right rear wheel motor id param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
119  right_rear_wheel_id_);
120  }
121  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/left_rear_wheel/id", left_rear_wheel_id_))
122  {
123  left_rear_wheel_id_ = 4;
124  ROS_WARN("%s Left rear wheel motor id param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
125  left_rear_wheel_id_);
126  }
127 
128  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/right_front_wheel/dir", right_front_wheel_dir_))
129  {
130  right_front_wheel_dir_ = 1;
131  ROS_WARN("%s Right Front wheel motor dir param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
132  right_front_wheel_dir_);
133  }
134  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/left_front_wheel/dir", left_front_wheel_dir_))
135  {
136  left_front_wheel_dir_ = -1;
137  ROS_WARN("%s left Front wheel motor dir param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
138  left_front_wheel_dir_);
139  }
140  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/right_rear_wheel/dir", right_rear_wheel_dir_))
141  {
142  right_rear_wheel_dir_ = 1;
143  ROS_WARN("%s Right rear wheel motor dir param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
144  right_rear_wheel_dir_);
145  }
146  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/left_rear_wheel/dir", left_rear_wheel_dir_))
147  {
148  left_rear_wheel_dir_ = -1;
149  ROS_WARN("%s Left rear wheel motor dir param not found, using the default value: %d", log_header_.c_str(),
150  left_rear_wheel_dir_);
151  }
152 
153  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/wheel_base", WHEEL_BASE_))
154  {
155  WHEEL_BASE_ = 0.2913;
156  ROS_WARN("%s Wheel Base param not found, using the default value: %f", log_header_.c_str(),
157  WHEEL_BASE_);
158  }
159  if (!nh_.getParam("/my_actuator/wheel_radius", WHEEL_RADIUS_))
160  {
161  WHEEL_RADIUS_ = 0.0525;
162  ROS_WARN("%s Wheel Radius dir param not found, using the default value: %f", log_header_.c_str(),
163  WHEEL_RADIUS_);
164  }
165 
166  motor_ids.push_back(left_front_wheel_id_);
167  motor_ids.push_back(right_front_wheel_id_);
168  motor_ids.push_back(right_rear_wheel_id_);
169  motor_ids.push_back(left_rear_wheel_id_);
170  sort(motor_ids.begin(), motor_ids.end());
171  for (int8_t i = 0; i < 4; i++)
172  {
173  health.push_back(vit());
174  }
175  ROS_INFO("%d: Health:", health[0].temperature);
176 }
177 void my_actuator_control::init_subs_pubs_srvs()
178 {
183  // Publishers
184  plot_pub_ = nh_.advertise<my_actuator::plot>("/plot", 10);
185  vitals_pub_ = nh_.advertise<my_actuator::vitals>("/crawler_vitals", 10);
186 
187  // Subscribers
188  joy_sub_ = nh_.subscribe("/skid_steer/cmd_vel", 10, &my_actuator_control::joy_callback, this);
189  joy_sub_real = nh_.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Joy>("/joy", 10, &my_actuator_control::get_joy, this);
190 
191  toggle_joy_topic_ = "/toggle_joy";
192  toggle_joy_sub_ = nh_.subscribe(toggle_joy_topic_, 1,
193  &my_actuator_control::toggle_joy_callback_, this);
194  // Services
195  init_teleop_srv_ = nh_.advertiseService("/crawler_control_node/init_teleop",
196  &my_actuator_control::init_teleop_callback, this);
197  stop_teleop_srv_ = nh_.advertiseService("/crawler_control_node/stop_teleop",
198  &my_actuator_control::stop_teleop_callback, this);
199  stop_motors_srv_ = nh_.advertiseService("/crawler_control_node/stop_motors",
200  &my_actuator_control::stop_motors_callback, this);
201 }
202 
203 bool my_actuator_control::init_teleop_callback(std_srvs::TriggerRequest &req, std_srvs::TriggerResponse &res)
204 {
214  if (!init_teleop_)
215  {
216  // init_actuators();
217  init_teleop_ = true;
218  res.success = true;
219  res.message = "teleop started";
220  }
221  else
222  {
223  res.message = "init is already done.";
224  }
225 
226  return true;
227 }
228 bool my_actuator_control::stop_teleop_callback(std_srvs::TriggerRequest &req, std_srvs::TriggerResponse &res)
229 {
239  init_teleop_ = false;
240  ROS_INFO("%s Stopping teleop", log_header_.c_str());
241  for (int8_t i = 0; i < 4; i++)
242  {
243  act_api_->Motor_stop(i + 1);
244  }
245  res.success = true;
246  res.message = "teleop stopped";
247  return true;
248 }
249 
250 bool my_actuator_control::stop_motors_callback(std_srvs::TriggerRequest &req, std_srvs::TriggerResponse &res)
251 {
261  ROS_INFO("%sStopping motors", log_header_.c_str());
262  for (int8_t i = 0; i < 4; i++)
263  {
264  act_api_->Motor_stop(i + 1);
265  }
266 
267  init_teleop_ = false;
268  res.success = true;
269  res.message = "teleop stopped";
270  return true;
271 }
272 void my_actuator_control::init_actuators()
273 {
279  int setVEL, res;
280  act_api_->rmdX10_init();
281 }
282 void my_actuator_control::stop_actuators(int id)
283 {
290  if (init_teleop_)
291  {
292  }
293 }
294 void my_actuator_control::run_actuator(int id, double curr_vel)
295 {
296  if (init_teleop_)
297  {
298  act_api_->speedControl(id, (int)curr_vel);
299  }
300 }
301 
302 void my_actuator_control::joy_callback(const geometry_msgs::Twist &msg)
303 {
304 
305  vel.linear.x = msg.linear.x;
306  vel.angular.z = msg.angular.z;
307 }
308 void my_actuator_control::toggle_joy_callback_(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr &msg)
309 {
310 
311  toggle_joy_flag_ = msg->data;
312 }
313 void my_actuator_control::get_joy(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr &joy)
314 {
322  if (init_teleop_ && toggle_joy_flag_ == 0)
323  {
324 
325  if (joy->buttons[JoyStick::ACT1_2_ON_OFF])
326  {
327  act1_sw_ = !act1_sw_;
328  act2_sw_ = !act2_sw_;
329  }
330  else if (joy->buttons[JoyStick::ACT3_4_ON_OFF])
331  {
332  act3_sw_ = !act3_sw_;
333  act4_sw_ = !act4_sw_;
334  }
335  }
336 }
337 void my_actuator_control::steer_calc_callback_(const ros::TimerEvent &)
338 {
345  if (init_teleop_)
346  {
347 
348  if (vel.linear.x == 0 && vel.angular.z == 0)
349  {
350 
351  velocity_left_cmd_ = 0;
352  velocity_right_cmd_ = 0;
353  }
354  else
355  {
356  velocity_left_cmd_ = ((vel.linear.x - vel.angular.z * WHEEL_BASE_ / 2.0) / WHEEL_RADIUS_) * velocity_scale_;
357 
358  velocity_right_cmd_ = ((vel.linear.x + vel.angular.z * WHEEL_BASE_ / 2.0) / WHEEL_RADIUS_) * velocity_scale_;
359  }
360 
361  if ((act1_sw_ == true && act2_sw_ == true) && (act3_sw_ == true && act4_sw_ == true))
362  {
363  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(left_front_wheel_id_);
364  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(right_front_wheel_id_);
365  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(left_rear_wheel_id_);
366  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(right_rear_wheel_id_);
367  // ROS_WARN("ALL shutdown.");
368  }
369  else if (act1_sw_ == true && act2_sw_ == true)
370  {
371  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(left_front_wheel_id_);
372  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(right_front_wheel_id_);
373  run_actuator(right_rear_wheel_id_, velocity_right_cmd_ * right_rear_wheel_dir_);
374  run_actuator(left_rear_wheel_id_, velocity_left_cmd_ * left_rear_wheel_dir_);
375 
376  // ROS_INFO("In act1");
377  // ROS_INFO("In act2");
378  }
379  else if (act3_sw_ == true && act4_sw_ == true)
380  {
381  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(left_rear_wheel_id_);
382  act_api_->Motor_shut_down(right_rear_wheel_id_);
383  run_actuator(left_front_wheel_id_, velocity_left_cmd_ * left_front_wheel_dir_);
384  run_actuator(right_front_wheel_id_, velocity_right_cmd_ * right_front_wheel_dir_);
385  // ROS_INFO("In act3");
386  // ROS_INFO("In act4");
387  }
388  else
389  {
390  run_actuator(left_front_wheel_id_, velocity_left_cmd_ * left_front_wheel_dir_);
391  run_actuator(right_front_wheel_id_, velocity_right_cmd_ * right_front_wheel_dir_);
392  run_actuator(right_rear_wheel_id_, velocity_right_cmd_ * right_rear_wheel_dir_);
393  run_actuator(left_rear_wheel_id_, velocity_left_cmd_ * left_rear_wheel_dir_);
394  // ROS_WARN("NORMAL drive");
395  }
396  }
397 }
398 
399 
400 void my_actuator_control::health_callback_(const ros::TimerEvent &)
401 {
402  uint8_t mode_var;
403  for (auto &it : motor_ids)
404  {
405  mode_var = -1;
406  get_vitals(it);
407  send_vitals.temp[it - 1] = health[it - 1].temperature;
408  send_vitals.error[it - 1] = health[it - 1].error;
409  int ret = act_api_->Motor_mode(it, mode_var);
410  // ROS_WARN("Motor %d: %u", it, mode_var);
411  if (ret)
412  send_vitals.mode[it - 1] = mode_var;
413  }
414  send_vitals.voltage = health[0].voltage;
415  send_vitals.header.frame_id = "crawler";
416  vitals_pub_.publish(send_vitals);
417 }
418 
419 void my_actuator_control::get_vitals(int id_)
420 {
421  int ret = 0;
422  int16_t error_ret_[4];
423  // 0 : temp 2 : voltage 3 : error
424  ret = act_api_->Motor_state1(id_, error_ret_);
425  if (ret)
426  {
427  health[id_ - 1].temperature = (int)error_ret_[0];
428  health[id_ - 1].voltage = (float)error_ret_[2] / 10.0;
429  health[id_ - 1].error = (int)error_ret_[3];
430  }
431 }
432 
433 int main(int argc, char **argv)
434 {
435  ros::init(argc, argv, "crawler_control_node");
436  ROS_INFO("[CrawlerTeleOpNode]: Starting Node");
437  ros::NodeHandle nh;
438  my_actuator_control crawler_teleop(nh);
439 
440  try
441  {
442  ros::spin();
443  }
444  catch (std::exception &e)
445  {
446  ROS_ERROR("%sException thrown: %s", crawler_teleop.log_header_.c_str(), e.what());
447  }
448  return 0;
449 }
